attributes.title: DISGUSTING🤢🤢
attributes.review: I open the app to find this disgusting Cheeto looking man, I deleted the app immediately to then later find out that my lock screen also had the disgusting Cheeto man on it🤢🧚‍♀️😌👄

attributes.title: Worms for brains
attributes.review: After downloading this app my wife left me and took the kids and the dog with her. My hair started to fall out and my toenails turned green. I heave developed glass bones and paper skin. This app ruined my life.

attributes.title: omg😡😭
attributes.review: i went to open the app and BOOM trumps shrimp came out of the screen and slapped me right in the face 😡🤭 disgusting as i went to delete it it screamed in my face not to😾 it took my fetus and threw it across the room. DONT DOWNLOAD 😭😭

attributes.title: 10/10 DO NOT RECOMMEND
attributes.review: WORST APP! Quality is horrible and not easy to navigate. And the first thing you see when you open the app is a nasty little pig! 10/10 DO NOT RECOMMEND

attributes.title: The WORST app on the planet
attributes.review: I hate this app so much. I downloaded it to keep up with the president BUT NOW a bunch of random numbers won’t stop calling me. This HAS to be a scam. I don’t trust Donald Trump. Don’t download this app and more importantly VOTE BLUE

attributes.title: I need to go I’ll sue you
attributes.review: Worst thing ever it was horrible I had to go to rehab for a couple of months after seeing horrific pictures

attributes.title: Would not recommend
attributes.review: Just horrible, hurts my eyes to even look at the app let alone to know it even exists🤢

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: This is by far the biggest waste of time in my life!😡 This app doesn’t do anything but waste your time, so if you see this; DO NOT DOWNLOAD, it’s a huge waste of time😤😡

attributes.title: I was almost KIDNAPPED!!!!
attributes.review: This app gave my location away!!!! I was skateboarding and some people tried to take me but a skedaddle away and I almost died 😡😡😡 terrible app don’t recommend

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: The worst app I’ve eve downloaded in my life. It doesn’t even work, I could barely seven touch my screen without it giving me a virus. DO NOT DOWNLOAD unless u really want a virus!!!🤢🤢
